languages.text: "Слова. Не исправят. Содеянного". {n}Дознаватель стискивает руку на оружии, но медлит, напряженно переводя взгляд с вас на ксеноса и обратно.{/n}
"Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Слова. Не исправят. Содеянного". {n}Дознаватель стискивает руку на оружии, но медлит, напряженно переводя взгляд с вас на ксеноса и обратно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but is hesitant, turning his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “道歉，不能弥补，已经犯下的错误。”{n}海因里希握住武器，凌厉的目光有些犹豫地从你的身上移到伊莉耶特的身上，随后又转回到你的身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “道歉，不能弥补，已经犯下的错误。”{n}海因里希握住武器，凌厉的目光有些犹豫地从你的身上移到伊莉耶特的身上，随后又转回到你的身上。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Las palabras. No enmiendan. La afrenta». {n}El interrogador aprieta la empuñadura de su arma, pero vacila; su mirada pasa rápidamente de ti a la xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Las palabras. No enmiendan. La afrenta». {n}El interrogador aprieta la empuñadura de su arma, pero vacila; su mirada pasa rápidamente de ti a la xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « De simples mots ne répareront pas ce qui a été commis. » {n}L'interrogateur empoigne son arme, mais hésite, posant tour à tour son regard glaçant sur vous et sur la xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « De simples mots ne répareront pas ce qui a été commis. » {n}L'interrogateur empoigne son arme, mais hésite, posant tour à tour son regard glaçant sur vous et sur la xénos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Worte. Reparieren nicht. Was beschädigt wurde." {n}Der Interrogator greift zur Waffe, zögert aber, und sein Blick wandert zwischen dir und der Xenos hin und her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Worte. Reparieren nicht. Was beschädigt wurde." {n}Der Interrogator greift zur Waffe, zögert aber, und sein Blick wandert zwischen dir und der Xenos hin und her.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「言葉…では解決できません。やったことを解決できないのです」{n}インテロゲイターは武器を握りしめるものの、ためらうように、強烈な視線をあなたから異種族へ、そしてまたあなたへと戻す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言葉…では解決できません。やったことを解決できないのです」{n}インテロゲイターは武器を握りしめるものの、ためらうように、強烈な視線をあなたから異種族へ、そしてまたあなたへと戻す。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sözler. Yapılanları. Değiştirmez." {n}Sorgucu, silahına sarılsa da tereddüt ediyor. Ciddi bakışlarını önce zenoya, sonra tekrar sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Words. Will not fix. What has been done." {n}The Interrogator grips his weapon, but he hesitates, shifting his intense gaze from you to the xenos, and then back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sözler. Yapılanları. Değiştirmez." {n}Sorgucu silahına sarılıyor, sonra tereddüt ediyor. Ciddi bakışlarını önce zenoya sonra tekrar sana çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
